forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Mostly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 11am. Mostly sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 8 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 9 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the morning unfolds with a gentle touch of promise, where the lingering veil of last night’s drizzle gives way to partial clarity. The air, fresh and crisp, carries a hint of the sea, as soft breezes dance through the streets, whispering the secrets of the Bay. While the sun begins to assert its presence, casting a warm glow, one might say the sky remains wearing a delicate cloak of clouds, hinting at the depth of the marine layer that colors the horizon with muted tones. The iconic outline of the Golden Gate stands distant yet proud, slightly veiled, reminding us of the city’s ever-changing canvas.

As the day progresses, expect the gentle warmth to peak around 65 degrees, settling softly around 63 by afternoon, inviting a leisurely day under the wide, yet partially obscured, expanse overhead. Dressing in layers will serve you well; a light jacket or a cozy sweater will provide comfort against the brisk wind that will flirt with gusts of up to 23 mph—a faithful companion to those brave enough to venture outside. Today’s weather beckons you to stroll along the waterfront or perhaps sip a warm coffee in a quiet café, soaking in the unique ambiance of this splendid city as it transitions into nighttime’s embrace.
